name: Extreme Research
description:
What is "Extreme Research"?

"Extreme Research" is a learning game that lets players experience and comprehend the daily tasks carried out by a researcher at the South Pole. In addition to its purely cognitive goal, the project also aims to increase public awareness of the issue of global warming. In comparison to other continents, this one has a greater prevalence of preventive responses. The user will be able to comprehend how much climate change has serious and immediate effects on our planet thanks to the data gathered during the various activities.

📚 This project was created for the Politecnico di Torino's "Virtual reality" course.
